description.translate: Sometimes it is better to be in bad company than alone.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Associé du vice\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Parfois il vaut mieux être mal\"}","{\"text\":\"§7accompagné, que seul.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Sometimes it is better to be in\"}","{\"text\":\"§7bad company than alone.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7HER§a1 §7DAR§a1 §7HUN§a1 §7HAS§c-1\"}"]}}
